title: Personal vs Area Air Monitoring: When to Use Each
summary: Understand the differences between personal and area air monitoring and when each method is appropriate.

sections.heading: Personal Air Monitoring
body: Personal sampling measures exposure in a worker’s breathing zone.
It provides the most accurate representation of individual exposure.

sections.heading: Area Monitoring
body: Area sampling measures contaminant levels in a general location.
It helps evaluate engineering controls and environmental conditions.

sections.heading: Choosing the Right Method
body: Personal monitoring is required for exposure compliance decisions.
Area monitoring supplements exposure data and verifies controls.
